docs.lead_paragraph: A new law will affect lower-income people who claim one of two refundable tax credits, and who may be caught off guard by their refunds’ delay.

headline.main: For Earned-Income Credit Filers, Refunds Will Be Later

docs.snippet: In a story Jan. 4 about aging and finances, The Associated Press misidentified two sources. Billy Hensley is the senior director of education for the National Endowment for Financial Education. The prior version named him Bill and dropped the "sen...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Jan. 4 about aging and finances, The Associated Press misidentified two sources. Billy Hensley is the senior director of education for the National Endowment for Financial Education. The prior version named him Bill and dropped the "senior" from his title. And cited research came from the University of Alabama at Birmingham, not the University of Alabama.

headline.main: Correction: On the Money-Financial Fragility Story
headline.print_headline: Correction: On the Money-Financial Fragility Story

headline.main: No Brexit Panic Yet as Foreigners Buy UK Bonds at Record Pace
